
class patrolOps
{
	tag = "PatrolOps";
	class patrolGeneration 
	{
		file = "PatrolOps\patrol generation";
		class initpatrol {};
		class generateRouteMarkers {};
		class generateLocations {};
		class patrolCleanUp {};

	};
	class effects
	{
		file = "PatrolOps\effects";
		class unconscious {};
	};
	class Functions
	{
		file = "PatrolOps\functions";
		class getRoadInfo {};
	};
};
class DT_Core {
	tag = "DT";

	class Groups {
		file = "Groups";
		class assignPlayer {};
		class handleDisconnect {};
		class initGroupMenu {};
		class onGroupMenuTvSelectChange {};
		class onRespawn {};
		class removeFromGroup {};
		class selectPosition {};
		class setupPlayer {};
		class updateGroups {};
	};
};
#ifndef MODULES_DIRECTORY
    #define MODULES_DIRECTORY modules
#endif

class grad_gpsTracker {
    class common {
        file = MODULES_DIRECTORY\grad-gpsTracker\functions;

        class addPFH {};
        class closeTitle {};
        class createGPS {};
        class getModuleRoot {};
        class initModule {preInit = 1;};
        class openDialog {};
        class openTitle {};
        class setTarget {};
        class updateArrow {};
        class updateBackground {};
        class updateDistance {};

    };
};
